code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const getCurrentTime=()=>{const date=new Date();return"".concat(date.getHours()<10?'0':'').concat(date.getHours(),":").concat(date.getMinutes()<10?'0':'').concat(date.getMinutes());};const Screen=_ref=>{let{time,message}=_ref;const[expirationTime,setExpirationTime]=useState(getCurrentTime());const[price,setPrice]=useState('$0.00');const formatTime=time=>{const hours=Math.floor(time/60);const minutes=time%60;return"".concat(hours<10?'0':'').concat(hours,":").concat(minutes<10?'0':'').concat(minutes);};const calculateExpiration=minutes=>{const currentTime=new Date();const expirationTime=new Date(currentTime.getTime()+minutes*60000);const timeString="".concat(expirationTime.getHours()<10?'0':'').concat(expirationTime.getHours(),":").concat(expirationTime.getMinutes()<10?'0':'').concat(expirationTime.getMinutes());setExpirationTime(timeString);};const calculatePrice=time=>{const priceInCents=50*(time/15);const dollars=Math.floor(priceInCents/100);const cents=priceInCents%100;setPrice("$".concat(dollars,".").concat(cents<10?'0':'').concat(cents));};useEffect(()=>{calculateExpiration(time);calculatePrice(time);},[time]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"description",children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Total time: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:formatTime(time)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bottom-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Expires:",expirationTime]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Price:",price]})]})]});};export default Screen;
